00018 // System includes
00019 
00020 #include <iostream>
00021 #include <time.h>
00022 #include <stdexcept>
00023 
00024 // Utilities includes
00025 
00026 #include "../Purple/Utilities/Vector.h"
00027 #include "../Purple/Utilities/Matrix.h"
00028 
00029 // Objective function includes
00030 
00031 #include "../Purple/ObjectiveFunction/RosenbrockFunction.h"
00032 
00033 // Optimization algorithm includes
00034 
00035 #include "../Purple/OptimizationAlgorithm/ConjugateGradient.h"
00036 
00037 using namespace Purple;
00038 
00039 int main(void)
00040 {
00041    std::cout << std::endl
00042              << "Purple: An Open Source Numerical Optimization C++ Library." 
00043              << std::endl
00044              << "Conjugate Gradient Application." << std::endl;
00045 
00046    srand( (unsigned)time( NULL ) );
00047 
00048    // Rosenbrock function object
00049 
00050    RosenbrockFunction rosenbrockFunction;
00051 
00052    int numberOfVariables = 10;
00053 
00054    rosenbrockFunction.setNumberOfVariables(numberOfVariables);
00055 
00056    Vector<double> lowerBound(numberOfVariables, -5.12);
00057    Vector<double> upperBound(numberOfVariables, 5.12);
00058 
00059    rosenbrockFunction.setLowerBound(lowerBound);
00060    rosenbrockFunction.setUpperBound(upperBound);
00061 
00062    // Conjugate gradient object
00063 
00064    ConjugateGradient conjugateGradient(&rosenbrockFunction);
00065 
00066    conjugateGradient.setSearchDirectionMethod(ConjugateGradient::FletcherReeves);
00067    conjugateGradient.setOptimalStepSizeMethod(ConjugateGradient::BrentMethod);
00068 
00069    conjugateGradient.setOptimalStepSizeTolerance(1.0e-6);
00070 
00071    conjugateGradient.setEvaluationGoal(0.0);
00072    conjugateGradient.setGradientNormGoal(0.0);
00073    conjugateGradient.setMaximumNumberOfIterations(1000);
00074    conjugateGradient.setMaximumTime(1000.0);
00075     
00076    conjugateGradient.setShowPeriod(100);
00077   
00078    Vector<double> initialArgument(numberOfVariables, 1.2);
00079 
00080    conjugateGradient.setInitialArgument(initialArgument);
00081    
00082    conjugateGradient.print();
00083    
00084    conjugateGradient.save("../Data/ConjugateGradient/ConjugateGradient.dat");
00085    
00086    Vector<double> minimalArgument = conjugateGradient.getMinimalArgument();
00087 
00088    conjugateGradient
00089    .saveOptimizationHistory("../Data/ConjugateGradient/OptimizationHistory.dat");
00090 
00091    std::cout << std::endl;         
00092 
00093    return(0);
00094 }
